title: Super Voter Suppression, VERY MUCH NOT RACIST 3.12.21
itunes:title: Super Voter Suppression, VERY MUCH NOT RACIST 3.12.21
description:
In episode 830, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Dalia Malek to discuss the Derek Chauvin trial, and LA Times report about how the LAPD mishandled the George Floyd protests, Stacey Abrams working to stop voter suppression in Georgia, Prince William claiming the Royal family isn't racist, Sharon Osbourne defending Piers Morgan, Ron Howard's Thai cave rescue movie, how the pandemic is messing with our brains, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Third-degree murder charge reinstated in Derek Chauvin trial
  2. Highly Critical Report Faults LAPD For Mishandling Summer George Floyd Unrest
  3. Stacey Abrams Has a Plan to Dismantle the Filibuster and Protect Voting Rights
  4. H.R.1 - For the People Act of 2021
  5. Republicans roll out “tidal wave of voter suppression”: 253 restrictive bills in 43 states
  6. Prince William Says “We Are Very Much Not A Racist Family” After Prince Harry & Meghan Markle’s Oprah Interview
  7. SHARON OSBOURNE FIERCELY DEFENDS PAL PIERS MORGAN ... How Is He A Racist?!?
  8. Piers Morgan says Meghan Markle 'ghosted' him in a resurfaced video that trended after he criticized her descriptions of mental illness
  9. Ron Howard’s Thai Cave Rescue Movie Casts Viggo Mortensen, Colin Farrell, Joel Edgerton, and More
  10. Late-Stage Pandemic Is Messing With Your Brain
  11. Coping with cascading collective traumas in the United States 
  12. WATCH: As an Adult - Illingsworth

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
